item.title: Bevar whitespace i output med
item.description: Non-breaking space – &nbsp; – er ikke bare non-breaking, den er også ‘non-collapsing’. Som du kan læse på wikipedia: Non-collapsing behavior A second common application of non-breaking spaces is in plain text file formats such as SGML, HTML, TeX and LaTeX, whose rendering engines are programmed to treat sequences of whitespace characters (space, newline, tab, form feed, etc.) as if they were a single character (but this behavior can be overridden).
